name: Cookie Catch!
description:
** Latest version fixes bugs in iOS 5 **

How many falling cookies can you catch in your glass of milk?

Cookie Catch is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Earn points for each cookie you catch. Some cookies fall faster but are worth more! Watch out for the giant cookie - it will smash your glass!

How quick are your reflexes? Think you got what it takes to catch cookies all day? The cookies will start falling faster and faster, so try to keep up - miss three cookies and it's game over!

Collect enough cookies and you can unlock power-ups that will help you catch even more!


*** FEATURES ***

* Simple swipe controls
* Collect cookies to buy power-ups
* Simple, intuitive gameplay
* Amazing retina graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Cookie Catch right now while it's 100% FREE!
